div.head: 熊獸傷
div.div: harm caused by bears and [other] animals

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by bears and [other] animals

sense.def: Pathological Condition of injuries inflicted by wild animals. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治 藥 quoting the main entries on su 粟 and li 栗：熊虎爪傷 , “Harm caused by the claws of bears and tigers”, writes: 熊獸傷 , “ Harm caused by bears and other beasts ”.
